documents.document:
Korean media said that after the age of 40 was first married

Korea Gyeonggi-do family and the Women's Institute announced the results show that after the age of 40 was first married Korean in recent years a significant increase.
ralph lauren
Korea Matchmaker Duo offers the data show that Korean marriage applications increased by 58.2% compared to 2010, has tripled compared to 2001 was the first time in 2011 after 40 years of age.
polo ralph lauren
Korean delay marriage, mainly due to financial problems. Gyeonggi-do family and the Institute for Women An Taiyong (Ahn, Tae-yoon,) said: "People only financial security will be married, but this protection is usually to a great age, when will achieve." In other words, to buy a house, child rearing and child education costs are too high, they had to delay marriage.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
But financial problems are not the only factor. Said the Duo mysterious Nankui (Hyun Nam-kyu,): "In the past, social attitudes will limit people to marry in a particular age, but this limitation is disappearing, so we can see that the first marriage were distributed in different ages. "
GHD
In addition, the Korean attitude toward marriage is changing. Hastily married people no longer seek financial security or stability in life, but in the full enjoyment of the finished single life full of travel and dating, will find to accompany a lifetime of love. Beauty consultant's skin Xuanzhen (Pi Hyun-jeong), said: "modern people generally look younger than their peers over the past 10 years of age if the main objective of having children is not married, I think the most appropriate age for marriage is 40 years old. "
Lisseur Ghd
Many people believe that the late marriage will make life better. 42-year-old married publisher Jin Yinan (Kim Yi-kum) said: "If I married about 20 years old, I may not know what they really want, I might run away from home, unable to endure the pressure of work and raising children.the past years of experience can help me to maintain a happy marriage. "
www.lisseurghdfrance.net
The latest data released by the Korea Bureau of Statistics show that married later the couple, the divorce rate is lower. This shows that older couples are more satisfied with their marriage

Afghan President openly supported to allow her husband to be

Afghan President Hamid Karzai Hamid Karzai has publicly expressed support for the religious law allows a husband beat his wife and other restrictions on female behavior. Local human rights organizations, which represents a big step backward in women's rights in Afghanistan.
ralph lauren
Afghan Islamic scholars (Ulema Council) of the Council recently issued by the behavior of the Act stipulates that women can not travel without a male guardian, and not in public places such as schools, markets, or in the office, contacts with strange men; men beat their wives , of course, the beaten and the Islamic law-related; In addition, the divorced woman is more restrictive.
polo ralph lauren
A press conference in Kabul, Karzai publicly expressed support for these decrees, saying that comply with Islamic law, and with reference to the views of women's rights organizations in Afghanistan. Karzai said: "the Council of Islamic scholars did not impose any restrictions on women, these are all Muslims and Afghans should comply with Islamic law."
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
British media that Karzai publicly support the fatwa of the restrictions on female behavior may be intended to curry favor with the Taliban, or simply want to get the support of the Council of Islamic scholars of the body can become the government and the rebels negotiations. middleman.
GHD
However, the feminist who said Karzai's behavior means that the existing or planned to enact the Law on the Protection of the rights of women to become the victim of the peace negotiations.
Lisseur Ghd
Fata Na Ishaq Gailani (Fatana Ishaq Gailani), the creator of the "Afghan Women Committee, said she supports negotiations with the Taliban, but Afghan women should not be sacrificed. www.lisseurghdfrance.net

Coca-Cola was traced to carcinogens change process of the st

Coca-Cola Company and PepsiCo beverage companies have recently caught in a "carcinogens storm". Multi-news source on the 8th confirmed that Coca-Cola and other companies have begun to reduce its carbonated drinks, chemicals 4 – methylimidazole content in order to achieve the statutory standards, California, USA.
ralph lauren
Companies have changed the production process

Coca-Cola spokeswoman Diane Garza - Qialan Te in an email to confirm the companies have caramel suppliers to improve production processes, in order to reduce the content of cola coloring agent Caramel 4 - methylimidazole.
polo ralph lauren
4 - methylimidazole is a Companion of the ammonium sulfite as raw materials to produce the caramel. Mice for animal experiments show that 4 - methylimidazole may induce lung cancer. California 4 - methylimidazole as a carcinogen, the provisions of this substance in a food or drink containing more than 29 micrograms, warning marks on the packaging.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
U.S. consumer rights agency CSPI earlier this month released the results of laboratory tests: listen to that is, about 340 g Pepsi contain 145-153 micrograms of 4 - methylimidazole, each listening to Coca-Cola contains 132 micrograms, several other hot-selling brand of canned Coke 4 - methylimidazole content in all more than 100 micrograms. The American Beverage Association Statement on the 8th, the Association member companies to improve production processes to comply with the California standards, intends shortly after promotion to the United States.

The carcinogenic said doing animal experiments only
GHD
The CSPI petition to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration last month, advocates food and drinks, prohibit the use of raw materials to produce ammonium sulfite caramel. The Food and Drug Administration is currently assessing this application. According to Reuters, the U.S. regulatory bodies and industry associations have differences of opinion.
Lisseur Ghd
Food and Drug Administration (FDA) Some experts believe that the 4 - methylimidazole statement may be carcinogenic in animal experiments only received validation, can not infer that it may be caused by the human risk of cancer; even confirmation carcinogenic, Coke in the content of this material is insufficient affect human health.
www.lisseurghdfrance.net
The government regulatory department under the caramel 4 - methylimidazole content of not more than 250ppm. ppm concentration measurement units, each one millionth. CSPI detected 4 - methylimidazole content in cola drinks up to the equivalent of 0.4ppm. Food and Drug Administration spokesman Doug Kallas said, consumers drank more than 1000 cola intake by 4 - methylimidazole amount was equivalent to the intake of the animals in the experiment, sufficient amount of carcinogenic .
